Welcome to the UVa Hydroinformatics Group

Our aim is to address some of societyâ€™s most challenging water resources problems by understanding, analyzing, and managing water systems as cyber-physical systems. We are part of the interdisciplinary Link Lab, a center of excellence in cyber-physical systems housed within the Engineering School at the University of Virginia.
